name: Collect Game
description:
You start with a bunch of lots.  You upgrade them into buildings when you can use to get resources.  Those resources let you build other buildings, which let you get other resources.  You use resource to fulfill requests, which gives you other resources that allow you to build more buildings.  Repeat.

TLDR

build stuff -> produce stuff -> fulfill stuff -> repeat

CONTROLS

Arrow keys to move the map

Mouse click stuff

To destroy a building hold the D key and click the building.  This turns the building into a Lot.  No resources are refunded.

TIPS

Don't use all of your lots immediately

Don't run out of oats to plant
